page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE.........
page.content: A Day in my Life by Trudy,aged 11: I get up at half past seven,go and brush my teeth,wash and then go to the toilet and then get dressed and take my dog for a quick walk.When I come back I have acup of tea,put my coat on and go to school. I arrive in school at about a quarter to nine.School starts at ten to nine:we go to assembly and sing.Then we go to sets, we do Maths and English. We have dinner at ten past twelve.We go back to our classes at about ten past one.We do general studies in the afternoon and go home at a quarter past three. After tea I go to call Charlotte and we play in the park.Then I go home, have supper, watch T.V. and go to bed.
